hooks.name: LocalStorage
hooks.description: Syncs state with localStorage for persistent data across reloads.

hooks.name: Location
hooks.description: Fetches the user's current geolocation using the browser's Geolocation API.

hooks.name: ClickOutside
hooks.description: Detects clicks outside a specified element to trigger callbacks (e.g. for closing modals or dropdowns).

hooks.name: Clipboard
hooks.description: Provides utility to copy text to the clipboard and detect clipboard changes.

hooks.name: Debounce
hooks.description: Delays execution of a function until after a specified delay has passed since the last call.

hooks.name: Mobile
hooks.description: Detects if the current device is a mobile or tablet based on screen size or user agent.

hooks.name: Previous
hooks.description: Returns the previous value of a state or prop from the previous render.

hooks.name: Timeout
hooks.description: Runs a function after a specified delay, with ability to clear or reset the timeout.
